creator: i.galic@brainsware.org
text:
Created attachment 25053
Modify mod_proxy_http.c to log backend->port in ErrorLog

Often I will see log entries such as:

[Wed Feb 24 15:07:47 2010] [error] [client 85.92.222.254] (70014)End of file found: proxy: error reading status line from remote server 127.0.0.1


in the ErrorLog. Since I'm running multiple back-ends, this error message is leaving many open questions.. I've produced a trivial patch for trunk. (It should be easily backportable)

creator: sf@sfritsch.de
text: Fixed in trunk in r921347, r921583

creator: i.galic@brainsware.org
text:
Created attachment 25122
Same for 2.2

Is there a chance to see this fixed in 2.2 too?
